text: -dyaja#mAnO haqnyEtA$&sya yaqj~jO mitraiqtAmuqKAM taqpEtyA#haq brahmaq vai miqtrO brahma#nnEqvainAqM prati#ShThApayatiq nA&&rtiqmArcCa#tiq yaja#mAnOq nAsya# yaqj~jO ha#nyatEq yadiq BidyE#taq tairEqva kaqpAlaiqH sa(gm) sRu#jEqth saiva tataqH prAya#ScittiqryO gaqtaSrIqH syAnma#thiqtvA tasyAva# daddhyAd-BUqtO vA EqSha sa svAM - [  ] 47
